Mind Maze

A thrilling memory-based game where teams test their recall abilities in a series of exciting challenges!

About the Event

  • Dive into Mind Maze, a thrilling memory-based game where teams of two will test their ability to recall details and sequences!
  • Itâ€™s all about quick recall and teamwork, promising a memorable experience for all.

Event Details

Round 1: Sequence Recall

Participants will be shown a series of images in a specific sequence. Teams will have a limited time to observe, after which the images are hidden. Each team then writes down the sequence as accurately as possible.

Round 2: Object Recall

A collection of various objects will be displayed for a short period. Teams observe the setup and then attempt to recall and list as many objects as they can from memory once the display is removed.

Rules & Regulations

  • Each team must consist of 2 participants.
  • A maximum of 2 teams per college are allowed to participate.
  • Answers for each round must be written clearly on the sheets provided.
  • Participants must submit their answers within the given time limits for each round.

Judging Criteria

  • Accuracy of Recall
  • Speed of Response
